content: this is a summary of a legal case that involves a compensation claim the case has reached the court of appeal after going through the higher court in ljubljana the final resolution of the case is that the goods in question are valued at 4013700 eur and are to be split equally between the plaintiff and the defendant who are former spouses the court ruling is based on the marriage family relations act which states that property acquired during the marriage is considered coowned property the court takes into account factors such as the income of each spouse their contributions to the household and the care of children the defendant can rebut the presumption of equal shares in the community property by proving that they have done more work in the household the court of appeal has dismissed the appeals made by both parties and upheld the judgment made by the court of first instance the court has ordered one party to pay the costs of the appeal proceedings the court of first instance ruled that a coowned property should be divided between the parties involved with one party paying the other 2033700 eur the court also ordered the payment of interest with monthly installments both parties appealed the decision but the court of appeal upheld the judgment of the court of first instance the court considered the provisions of the civil procedure act and the family code in assessing the property regimes of the parties involved
